privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Cyprus Aluminum Specialists respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data when you use our aluminum fabrication services.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.contactForms: • Contact form data: Name, email, phone number, and project details when requesting aluminum fabrication quotes
dataCollection.projectInfo: • Project information: Details about your aluminum windows, doors, railings, or shutters requirements
dataCollection.communication: • Communication records: Phone calls, emails, and messages related to your aluminum projects
dataCollection.analytics: • Website analytics: Anonymous usage data to improve our aluminum fabrication services

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.quotes: • Provide accurate quotes for aluminum windows, doors, railings, and fabrication work
dataUse.projects: • Plan and execute your custom aluminum projects across Cyprus
dataUse.communication: • Contact you about project timelines, materials, and installation schedules
dataUse.improvements: • Improve our aluminum fabrication services and customer experience

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.security: • Your information is securely stored and protected from unauthorized access
dataProtection.retention: • Project data retained for 3 years for warranty and service purposes
dataProtection.sharing: • We never sell or share your information with third parties
dataProtection.compliance: • We comply with Cyprus and EU data protection regulations

privacy.contact: For privacy questions or to update your information, contact us at info@cyprusaluminum.com or +357 99 123 456.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These terms govern your use of Cyprus Aluminum Specialists website and services. By contacting us or using our aluminum fabrication services, you agree to these terms.

services.title: Our Aluminum Services
services.description: • Professional aluminum fabrication including windows, doors, railings, and shutters
services.coverage: • Service coverage across all Cyprus regions: Nicosia, Limassol, Larnaca, Paphos, Famagusta
services.quality: • Premium materials and certified installation by experienced professionals
services.warranty: • 2-year warranty on all aluminum fabrication and installation work

projectTerms.title: Project Terms
projectTerms.quotes: • Free quotes valid for 30 days from issue date
projectTerms.deposit: • 50% deposit required to begin aluminum fabrication work
projectTerms.measurements: • Final measurements confirmed on-site before production begins
projectTerms.timeline: • Project timelines depend on custom fabrication requirements and weather conditions
projectTerms.materials: • High-quality aluminum materials sourced from certified suppliers

website.title: Website Usage
website.purpose: • Website intended for genuine aluminum fabrication project inquiries
website.content: • All content, photos, and designs protected by copyright
website.accuracy: • Information provided for general guidance; final specifications confirmed during consultation

liability.title: Service Terms
liability.standards: • All work performed to Cyprus building codes and safety standards
liability.weather: • Installation schedules may adjust due to weather conditions
liability.access: • Customer responsible for providing safe site access during installation
liability.disputes: • Any disputes resolved under Cyprus law and jurisdiction

terms.contact: For terms questions or project inquiries, contact us at info@cyprusaluminum.com or +357 99 123 456.

seo.title: Professional Aluminum Fabrication Cyprus | Custom Windows, Doors & Railings
seo.description: Expert aluminum fabrication services in Cyprus. Custom windows, doors, railings, and shutters. Over 15 years of experience. Free quotes available.
seo.keywords: aluminum fabrication Cyprus, aluminium fabrication Cyprus, aluminum contractor Cyprus, aluminum company Cyprus, aluminum windows doors, aluminum specialist Cyprus, custom aluminum work, aluminum setup Cyprus, railings balconies, rolling shutters, aluminum installation Cyprus, metal fabrication Cyprus, aluminum expert Nicosia, aluminum services Cyprus, aluminum contractor Nicosia, aluminum contractor Limassol, aluminum contractor Larnaca

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about our aluminum fabrication and installation services in Cyprus

services.question: What aluminum fabrication services do you offer in Cyprus?
services.answer: We provide comprehensive aluminum fabrication services including custom aluminum window setup, door installation, railing fabrication, and shutter installation across all of Cyprus. As aluminum specialists, we handle everything from design to installation with over 15 years of experience.

specialist.question: Are you an aluminum specialist or general contractor?
specialist.answer: We are aluminum specialists with over 15 years of experience in aluminum and aluminium fabrication, focusing exclusively on metal fabrication and custom aluminum work. Our team consists of certified aluminum contractors who specialize in professional aluminum setup and installation.

areas.question: Do you serve all areas of Cyprus for aluminum installation?
areas.answer: Yes, our aluminum contractors provide services across Cyprus including Nicosia, Limassol, Larnaca, Paphos, and Famagusta for all aluminum fabrication needs. We are a Cyprus-wide aluminum company offering professional installation and setup services.

setup.question: How long does custom aluminum setup and installation take?
setup.answer: Custom aluminum setup time varies depending on the project scope. Simple aluminum window or door installation typically takes 1-2 days, while complex aluminum railing fabrication or full aluminum setup projects may take 3-7 days. We provide detailed timelines during consultation.

experience.question: Why choose your aluminum fabrication company over others in Cyprus?
experience.answer: As Cyprus aluminum specialists with over 15 years of experience, we offer superior craftsmanship, custom aluminum solutions, and professional setup services. Our aluminum contractors are certified and we guarantee quality workmanship on all aluminum fabrication projects across Cyprus.

warranty.question: What warranty do you provide on aluminum installations and what materials do you use?
warranty.answer: We provide a comprehensive 2-year warranty on all aluminum fabrication work and installations. We use only premium-grade aluminum profiles and certified materials from trusted European suppliers, ensuring long-lasting durability and weather resistance. All hardware components come with manufacturer warranties, and our workmanship guarantee covers any installation issues.
